newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan July industrial output up 1.71 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan July industrial output up 1.71 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Taiwan's industrial output in July rose 1.71 percent from a year earlier, the economics ministry said on Wednesday.
The manufacturing index, including metals, machinery, information electronics, chemical and consumer products, rose 2.24 percent in July compared to July 1995.
Real estate and construction industry output fell 19.33 percent from a year earlier. Mining industry output was up 2.01 percent compared with a year ago.
The ministry said there had been a general recovery in all sectors, which was reflected in the slowing declines in the real estate and construction industries.
